content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 1:19am and it was very bright in the bedroom.  i kinda think that's what woke me up. i didn't think much about it so i went on the back porch to smoke a cigarette. i didn't even smoke the whole thing and i went back to bed, and when i looked at the clock it said 3:30.

i thought it was really strange, but went back to sleep anyway.

in the am, i remembered that i had a really strange dream about a strange disk in the sky above the neighbors house. i just stared at it till i saw it rotate slightly and i realized it was real!

i didn't feel any different in the morning, and my clothes weren't on inside out or backwards or anything.
i did notice an itchy bump at the base of my skull a day later, and when i scratched it off... i got a really bad headache like nothing ever before! and i have migrains so i know it was not that.

i didn't really give it much thought, untill i saw a story on the news a few days later about several people reporting a ufo south of where i live.

then tonight my friend and i saw an orange throbbing light bobbing through the night sky! but i'll make a seperate report for that one! 

looks like something is going on that they might take interest in!
content.summary: Strange disk hovering above the neighbors house to the back.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside facing west when i noticed flashing lights in the distance. i figured it was just an airplane but the flashing lights seemed a little strange to me; there were two white lights that flashed brightly and then a red light in between that flashed when the white ones were off. this continued for a while and then the white lights stopped and it was just two red lights flashing side by side, opposite of the other. by this time i had grabbed my binoculars and was observing the object through them. through the binoculars i could see that the two red lights just got brighter and dimmer but never turned off. as the object got closer the flashing patterns continued to change between a combination of red and white lights, but once it was directly overhead all flashing stopped and three white lights formed a perfect triangle and there was a red light in the center of the triangle. i observed it in this shape for the rest of the event and it eventually disappeared into thin air in the eastern sky, but it may have just gone behind some clouds. the whole event seemed strange with the flashing lights changing patterns and shapes so often and eventually forming an unmistakable triangle object, i'm not sure what it was.
content.summary: Triangle ufo over walla walla

content.detailedDescription:
As you know i reported many sightings over the years.  with the increase in crime and violence i have not been out at night very much over the past 2 years.  otherwise i saw and filmed white lights and other anomolies like umbrella shaped objects in my area.  since 1986 i saw strange white lights mysteriously appear then hover for minutes then just disappear without moving.  these lights appear then disappear from dusk until around 9:30 pm.  mufon of o.C. investigated these lights with me for 3 days in around 1996.  the lights went into mufon's records as "unknown" of course meaning ufo.  i already submitted my 1-hour dvd i filmed to mufon hqs.

tonight i saw from ihop restaurant an oval disk about 40 feet in diameter hovering about 200 feet from me at about 55 feet high.  it was vague, because it was dark, but at times it showed 3 white flashing lights on its left side.  by the time i opened the restaurant door calling my friend who worked there to look it was gone.  at the same time i saw this i saw a small white object appear from nowhere to my left, and slowly moving to my right (north to south).  it stopped and as it spinned it hovered for about a minute and a half.  it was about a 1/2" in diameter.  both objects disappeared by the time i tried calling my friend in the restaurant, and when i looked again.

after watching a number of dvd documentaries on the subject it seems that only opinions are made about it, and nothing is being done.  millions have reported sightings, and the government keeps their sightings and other obtained information top secret to the most part of to what is possible that even the government is not taking any affirmative action, as to what the objects are; where they come from or the reputable harm they can have.  it is like information from evidence is stored by the government, but action for the people's safety is completely ignored.

years ago i suggested that one of the objects i have seen and filmed should somehow be captured for study, so we know what we are better dealing with.  my idea was to fly a net over one using remote controlled helicopters, and bring it down.  if this concept is ridicules then there must be some other way.  shouldn't the government be interested by now to know what we the people are dealing with besides just gathering information? area 51 seems to be the only facility in the world that is associated with ufo technology.  and i understand it is not government related. and as far as it being involved with aliens is heresay.  also, i got drift of a possible intergalatic war.  personally i do not believe our weaponry compares to advanced alien weaponry.  why cannot mufon come forward and take a big step in dealing with the matter?
content.summary: Saw oval shaped object and fireball type object

content.detailedDescription: my mom and i were on our way back from clifton. we were heading north and pulled over by a local creek i fish out of to see how deep the water is in hopes of fishing tomorrow. we were at 3100n and 1000e close to the intersection. i was going back to my car and looked up and saw the object with a row of 4 red lights on what seemed to be the front behind them seemed to be a white hue/glow. it was pretty high up and it just seemed to be hovering there. it really creeped me out and we felt as though it was watching us. i turned off the car engine and car lights so i could really get a sense of how bright and far this object was or if it was making any noise. it hovered there for another minute or two and without sound or gaining speed it just took off to the southwest. it didn't even turn around or anything just took off but if what we thought we were looking at was the front how is that possible? its hard to say what shape the object was when we were looking at it with these red lights which seemed to ring it as if it was a disk/round/half cirle. but, then again it could have been a boomerang cause we were only seeing this one edge of it. if that were the case then its movement wouldn't have made sense. i am baffled. i m gonna guess and say it was a disk. when it took off it started flashing lights and turned out some of the red and looked like a plane would at high altitude. the white glow disappeared. i turned the car around and tried to stay in sight of it but it went directly into cloud cover and we lost sight of it. in total about 5 minutes passed that we got to watch it.
content.summary: It was a row of 4 red lights with a white glow behind them stationary for about 3 minutes after it was notices hovering then took off to the southwest

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home, heading south on interstate 25 around 10:30 pm when to my right, i noticed two very bright orange lights.  granted, i live close to the army base, fort carson, but that means i also see helicopters and planes all the time and i'm one hundred percent sure i know what they look like.

the two lights were side by side, but the one to my right was slightly sitting above the other, as if in some kind of formation.  i was on that interstate for a good ten or fifteen minutes while driving so, i watched them the entire time.  they did not move, but they almost seemed to pulse somewhat (like get brighter) and then they would disappear altogether.  they would reappear and be in the exact same position and place, to the best of my knowledge.  they must have disappeared/reappeared half a dozen times.  

other cars on the interstate seemed to notice them since a few of them were braking.  i go to my off-ramp and sat at the red light at the top and that is where i was able to get a photo.  my nikon coolpix isn't a great camera and the shot isn't great, but it's better than nothing.  

you could see the passenger side window frame in the top left hand side of the photo and in the distance, about 1,000 yards, you could see a large flat building with lights.  there is also some street lights in the photograph which probably might make the objects in question hard to see.  however, you'll notice the objects (in the center of the photo) are much more orange than the street lights.  

i tried blowing the photo up and sharpening it or enhancing it, but my software is limited.

i was too spooked to stop so, i kept driving, as i was now the only car in sight.  as i drove away from the objects, i kept checking my rear view and i thought i saw a third, although smaller object come up from below the two at an angle.  

i felt fine, just a little spooked as this was not the first time i had seen an object like this disappear then reappear and i was by myself so, i wanted to get home.  i could hear no sound, but then again i could not tell for sure or at all how far away or high these things were.  i know that the direction they were in...There is nothing for miles but foothills and forests.
content.summary: Two large orange lights in southwestern colorado sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my back yard @ 10 pm and seen what i thought to be a star or a plane. then i realized it wasn't either. i know planes don't move fast in a zig zag motion. i got really scared and went back in the house.Then around 10:45 pm i went out the front door and seen 3 triangle shapes. in different spots. the lights kept dimming in and out. i am a stay at home mom i'm not nuts, scared to death actually because this isn't the first time i seen the "star" zigzag. i have seen it atleast 4 times over the last few months.As of right now 11 pm they are still out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving fast,back and forth,light dimming then brighter

content.detailedDescription:
First off, im on the east coast. beach facing east south east. almost at the nc sc border. 

its a full moon tomorrow (but supposed to be a washout here, so i went to the beach tonight to take pics). i usually go to the beach on full moons, eclipses,storms, hurricanes, water spouts and meteor showers to get some awesome photos. tonight was the same, i had my family with me ( mom, brother, 2 daughters). there were plenty of other people on the beach as well, it was a warm clear summer night after all. 

then as i was holding the shutter down with my bulb setting on my camera, i was staring over the horizon, when suddenly 2 orange orbs appeared. they quickly dissolved (idk how else to describe it) i tried to move my camera to catch them, and suddenly another one appeared, and faded just as quick. but i caught it on my camera faintly. i continued taking photos with long shutter in hopes of catching more of these "orbs", and i caught 2 in my photos. but there were more, i just missed them ( had the camera pointing slightly off, dang it!) 

at this point everyone was talking about them. some people left because they were scared it was going to crash and cause a huge wave. others said "its like clover field" and most just stayed and watched on in amazement. 

these orbs happened several times. the first, 2 appear from up in the sky. like someone throwing a glowing bouncy ball directly at you, they had no tail almost. the faded into existence, got super bright, and the faded back out in a matter of seconds. 2 right beside each other (left one first then the right one and then went away at the same time.), then the were gone and a 3rd one appeared to the left of the other two. about 20 minutes after that, and other one appeared, only larger than any of the previous three. there was no noise other than the ocean. shortly after that, 3 appeared at the same time, only super close, like a plane over head, but still no noise. then one final one was faint in the distance. everyone was glued to the sky. about 30-45 mins after the last orb seen, military helicopters flew in from the south and north. we heard them coming. the paralleled the coast with lights on as normal. then the lights stopped, we could still hear them but could not see them in the dark. it gave everyone there an eerie feeling. very uneasy. 

i asked the local news, and they had no word of anything going on off shore tonight. i've lived near marine and army bases my entire life. i know what planes are like. i can tell you the type of plane just by the sound usually. i know what lights are for planes and which are for helicopters. i know what kind of things they do during practices. these lights were not anything that was flying. if i had to guess i'd say, ball lightening, a meteor falling at a straight angle to us, giving it a small tail and almost no sense of falling or a ufo. i have no idea what they are though, im just guessing blindly. the local news deemed it at "space junk".
content.summary: East coast orb over the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday morning i was heading south out of belgrade, mt on hwy 191 to go to my business to retreive something i forgot. anyway, as i was driving by this meadow, which is completely devoid of trees and completely flat, i noticed a black sphere approximately 3-4 ft in diameter heading north at about 40 - 50 feet off the ground, 150 - 200 yards off the highway and moving at about 20-30 mph. my first thought was that it was a balloon, but the wind that morning was out of the east and blowing real hard and this thing was not being buffeted by the wind whatsoever. it continued unaffecated by the wind for a distance of about 200 yds, bobbled a couple of times and rapidly decended to a height of about 8-10 ft and just sat there. i watched for a bit and seeing no further movement went on my way.
now was this a balloon? no. was it a government spy drone? possibly, but why would it be in some farmers' vacant field in montana? my personal feeling on what this could be is that it was an alien probe of some kind. possible looking for cattle to do some of that weird cattle mutilation **** to. it might be worth talking to the people that live near by to see if they have seen anything like this before or that morning. i wish i was able to get my camera off the floor of my truck to get a video clip, but i'm recovering from a broken clavicle (no, i wasn't high on pain meds!). if i ever see one of these again, hopefully, i can get some footage or even shoot it down so we can see what it really was.
if you go to google video search and type in "black orb ufo close" there is a video of one of these things and it is exactly like what i saw, but i think this video may be computer generated. what i saw was not!!
content.summary: 3'-4' diameter black sphere

content.detailedDescription: Driving my semi i was on hwy 281 heading to jamestown. i was between carrington and jameston when i saw a lighted up disc shaped object. i slowed don the truck and rolled window down to take the picture with my camera phone. objct was heading towards carrington moving very slow! i didnt see any blinking lights, or remember any sounds or anything like that!
content.summary: Lighted disc shape flying over tree top.

content.detailedDescription: i was at work while this happened. my roommate called and said he was having a smoke outside when he noticed a non-moving sparkling light in the sky. he called me to tell me about it. i told him to grab my digital camera with recording feature and get some footage. him and another friend watched as more lights appeared flashing different colors and moving in different formations. this was only happening in the view-screen of the camera. they said they could still only see the one with their naked eye. after watching this on the computer even more lights appear and disappear doing all sorts of flashing, color changing and maneuvering, but never actually leaving. they recorded for about 23 minutes until the memory card was full. they also took a still.
content.summary: While out, my friends sayy one flashing light in the sky. when recorded, many lights appeared on video.

content.detailedDescription:
At above time/date, was on patrol with another police officer travelling north on the stuart highway, about 10 kilometres north of cadney park homestead in central australia. i was the passenger in our police 4wd and my partner was driving.

it was nearing sunset at the time, however the sky was still bright and blue.

i had been looking around occasionally but also looking at/using things inside our vehicle at the time. i lookout straight out of the front windscreen and slightly upwards. i saw what i first thought was a very bright star. i then noticed it appeared to be moving slowly in a south-westerly direction, with reference to a fixed ground point north of our vehicle.

it was a quite bright white light no different to a star, despite the movement. i drew my partner's attention to it. he hadn't seen it as his sun visor was down. he instantly called it a ufo.

as the sun was getting low in the sky i started to think that the light might've been sunlight reflecting off a light aircraft. the light then began to fade, slowly at first then quite rapidly until it was no longer visible.

i thought that if it was an aircraft it might've been banking, and that i would shortly see light reflecting off it again. however after watching for 10 minutes it was not sighted again.
content.summary: Bright moving star-like light, eventually fading in a period of seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking on the phone, walking to the eastern side of the backyard.  i stopped and looked to the south because out of the corner of my eye i saw an orange light. it looked like a circular, bright, fireball object high up in the dark sky, i and thought it may be strange airplane lights i hadn't seen before.  there is a lot of air traffic in this area, and the light didn't match what i always see in the sky. at once, another identical circle began to "come out" of it, and it moved in a direct line to the left (and slightly down) of the original circle, and stopped.  another one "came out" of the original circle, and flew in a direct line to the right of it and stopped.  another emerged more slowly than the first two from the original circle, and also went to the right of the original circle and stopped right next to it. i couldn't believe what i was looking at, i was dumbfounded and couldn't get the words out to tell my sister (on the phone) what i was looking at.  all four circles lingered in each of their spots for a few seconds, and then the circle to the left moved very fast back into the original circle, as if pulled by a magnet.  the other two immediately followed, and as if all them were enclosed back in the original circle, it appeared to fold and vanished from sight, like it had been sucked away into an invisible place, leaving no visible trace.  i knew i had seen something phenomenal, and felt very small.  i went inside to tell my parents what i saw, went back outside and watched the same spot for a while, but there was nothing else.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orangish, fire-like circle appears in sky, 3 more identical objects appear to multiply from it, move away from the object, return, and all disappear

content.detailedDescription: We live off 707 in myrtle beach, down folly rd. went outside at 11 pm to take a break from a movie. looked up at sky and noticed what i thought were two stars directly parallel to each other. i could tell they were moving, i next thought maybe planes. there were no blinking lights or noise. but as we kept examining them i noticed they were not moving away or towards each other. they were moving strangely with no consistent pattern. we joked that maybe it was a ufo and at that moment the object on the right shot out a bright light diagonally towards the ground. it was white. no noise  but several dogs in the neighborhood started barking. it almost looked like it came off the object but it looked exactly like a shooting star on it came from this star like light on the right and after it disappeared the like a shooting star would do the two objects, lights, were still there. i quickly ran inside and grabbed my digital camera but was unable to get a shot other than the dark sky. we continued to watch for 25-30 minutes. i reported here in hopes others in my area noticed them too.
content.summary: Two bright star like objects.

content.detailedDescription:

content.summary: Tinham um como se estivesse pegando fogo na parte de sima dele

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on highway 71 coming back from houston when i came to a stop light. i was sitting there and out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright light; like someone shined a mirror in my eye. i looked up right away and saw five reflective gold balls floating next to each other each with a bright orange flashing light. i tried to take a picture but the stop light turned green and i had to go. i did a u-turn as fast as i could (about a mile down the highway) but i was unable to find them again.
content.summary: Five reflective gold balls with orange flashing light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard holding my baby when i looked up and seen a brght shinning ball moving in different directions at quick burts watched for 30 seconds before moving rapidly away
content.summary: Bright ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my mother's house watching a ufo documentary with her.  when it was over she went into the kitchen, and i went outside.  the sky was very cloudy with big puffy low clouds, as i was looking for ufos.  low in the south i saw 2 very small white dots hovering next to each other.  then i noticed they were alternately shooting electricity from them in the form of a bullhorn or cone.  the one to my left shot right at me, as though it seen me then the 2 slowly moved together in unison to my right behind a big cloud.  that's all i saw.

around 5 years ago i saw at dusk from tomy's restaurant a small dot of light blue light traveling northward.  every 7 seconds it shot out from it a large cone that seemed to make a hole in the sky about 20 feet in diameter.

4 months i could not sleep, and looking out my window from my bed i saw near the edge of my roof a small blue green hovering light that shot out a cone of white light every 7 seconds.  it was about 12,000 feet high, and i watched it for around 10 minutes.

can these objects be effecting our weather? as far as i know weather has been really weird at least around where i live, and in nc and ny.

thank you.
content.summary: 2 very small white dots hovering next to each other.

content.detailedDescription: It was daytime i heard a loud hissing sound, my friends we looked up at the same time and saw this object covered in fog,  with bright blue and green flouescent lights inside, and a tail of flame fly really low across the sky.
content.summary: Covered in fog, flurescent lights inside the fogg ,and loud hissing sound as object flew over

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home last night i noticed a bright orange light above the burbank hills.  at first i thought it might be just one of the lights on one of the radio towers or perhaps lights coming from a building in the hills and it seemed to be slowly falling and again chalked that up to my perception since i was driving, but once i stopped in a residential area and there wasn't the glare of the city lights in my line of vision, i could see the outline of the hills better and realized it had to have been at least a couple of hundred feet higher than any of the radio towers or buildings would have been and it was in fact slowly floating downward.  before the light turned green again, it actually stopped for a moment, hovered and then started moving up again.  because i live nearby an airport, and previously i lived near a military airbase, i've become very familiar with what the different aircraft coming to and from the locations look like and this was not like any of the aircraft lights i've seen before.

for some reason i couldn't stop looking at it but i felt intrigued more than fearful or concerned.  i didn't feel as though there was any danger but perhaps as if it was simply observing something.  

unfortunately i was unable to photograph it since i was driving but it was at a distance that i don't know if it would have mattered on my camera phone anyhow.  i should probably mention that i have seen other objects but felt like this one was one worthy of reporting.
content.summary: Glowing orange light above hills

content.detailedDescription:
I am a filmmaker.  i bought a used mini dv camcorder from a pawn shop (at least i think it was from a pawn shop - read on) several years ago and there was a used mini dv tape inside.  i don't really care to see peoples home movies so i didn't look at the tape until much later.  i was importing my own old footage into the computer when i rediscovered this tape.  there was some scenery shots on the tape as well as a shot of the glacier national park sign on the tape.  there was only about 3 minutes of footage on the tape and there wasn't any candid shots of people - just scenery.  it may have been a new tape for the shooters.  the tape ends with a shot of some glowing lights zooming through a huge canyon (presumably in gnp?).  i don't know if it is fake or not...Looks real - and if it is faked then how did footage end up on a physical tape inside a camera?  anyways...I would like to find the people who shot this.  i have purchased sooo many used cameras for shoots throughout the years that i honestly cannot determine when or where i bought this cam with its mysterious tape inside.  i posted the "ufo" clip on youtube - *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

check it out.  any hikers or others recognize the area?  any clues whatsoever to help me find out more?
content.summary: Discovered footage of unknown origin

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter actually witness the event.  she arrived home following a high school band concert extremely terrified.  while driving home thru a rural area, she stopped at a stop sign and glanced to her left.  she saw flying toward her about a dozen "fireball" objects that were the size of helicopters.  they were flying very slowly, but at a greater speed than a hoover.  she said they were flying very low, a little above treeline level.  one actually touched the ground and went back up.  she said she just sat there is disbelief, and she opened her window to get a better look.  she said they were silent.  they eventually flew off toward the southwest.

as she was sitting there watching a truck approached the intersection, and it just stopped and watched also.  after the objects flew away, the truck turned next to her and the male driver asked her "did you see that?".  the female passenger stated that she was glad they were not the only ones that had witnessed the incident.  my daughter wishes now she had gotten the person's name driving the truck.

my daughter was extremely upset when she got home, mentioning that god was supposed to return to the earth in fire.  i did not know what to do, so we just got in the car and drove back to where the incident had happened, but of course we saw nothing.  i came home and called the local police department to see if anyone else had reported anything, but they were very disinterested.

my daughter is an honor student and a really good kid with no alchol or drug issues.  we had just left her band concert so i knew exactly where she had been.

one other thing that seemed odd:  my son and i drove home a few minutes before her.  as we were driving down our driveway, i commented to my son how big and orange the moon was (i believe it must had been a full moon).  when my daughter was telling us about the incident, she said the items she saw were as orange as the moon was when this was going on.  but when we went out driving around, the moon was no longer orange and appeared to be about 1/3 of the size it was when my son and i drove home (and about the same time my daughter witnessed the incident).  that could be just because it was later and the moon's orientation in the sky was different, but it seemed a little odd to us.
content.summary: About 1 dozen silent fireballs, the size of helicoptors

content.detailedDescription: It was fall 2010 between the time of ten to eleven at night i would say.  i stepped outside to smoke on my back porch. i started to gaze at the stars like i do everynight,and was instantly drawn to a really bright star. something about it seemed out of place so i kept watching realizing it did not shimmer like any other star does. it was a perfect white orb. after staring at it about two minutes almost done with my cig it got a little larger in size but as it did the shape quickly turned cigar shape. thats when a feeling came over me like i knew what i was looking at, but i was not scared. i guess in shock. it stayed like that maybe six seven seconds then shot across the horizon like almost the speed of light. i was amazed! then almost wishing i could see more a tiny little white dot wiggled down stopping closely in line with where i saw the first orb then shot across the horizon following the other, and then one more repeating after that! the last two came in and shot off in less than ten seconds. i would have to say the speed of these things is mind blowing. makes nasa look like childs play. these were silent and when shot off there was no tail of light or sound. i live near the airport and watch airplanes pass all the time so there no confusion here. in my line of sight i would have to guess the first was far away and then moved toward my direction hints the orb getting larger and turning cigar shape. and the other two i think i might have witnessed coming into our atmosphere. i guess i'm just trying to say they were not extremely close someone the next state over could have seen this as well. i feel lucky and a little crazy i seen this. i just wish there was time to grab my camera. thanks
content.summary: Stepped outside and what i thought was a star turned cigar shaped. shot off at the speed of light. amazing!

content.detailedDescription: Video upload attempt in addendum to report filed previously
content.summary: Disc video

content.detailedDescription: Video upload attempt in addendum to report filed previously
content.summary: Disc video

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in kingman arizona checking out some of their ancient ruins and  hoover dam in april and we were out on the patio of our motel room gazing at the full moon and sky on a crystal clear night. my wife spotted it first and brought my attention to it, it was a really bright clearly round white light dropping down from the direction of the moon deep in space it dropped for quite a distance it seemed like and then it just all of a sudden shot in the opposite direction after that and disappeared. it was an awesome sight. we both looked at each other and i ask her what in the world do you think that was? her reply was it was not any type of a conventioal aircraft or a shooting star either because it just pulled a sharp left turn and it was gone without even slowing down.
content.summary: Bright light dropping from the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my pool, relaxing when i saw an orange orb fly over my house (est. 350 ft.) then, after that, i've seen lights, every once in a while in the air. now, after i told you guys about it on facebook, in bed  i saw a pale bluish light float past a window, as of someone was holding a dim, bluish, flashlight near the glass.
content.summary: Orange orb flies over house, later, after i tell you guys about it on facebook, ghostly blue light floats past window

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4:30 and started seeing orbs again....The first one flew north then about 5 min later another one flew south
then a few min later i saw another streak through the sky but very short and fast.
then to my amazement! and i mean this is the first craft i have ever seen where it looked just like a space ship!
it flew right over my head and out west towards the ocean. i saw it pretty clearly and it was about 1,000 feet in the air and was gliding
across the sky at a steady pace. there was an airplane landing and it went directly under the airplane.
it had no lights and no noise. it looked like it was semi see through white glowing material like a jelly fish in the ocean.
no lights but it had a triangle shape with a pointed nose. it also had the shape of a paper airplane with folds along the sides but the back had 3 or 4 points.
this was at 4:40 then right afterwards at 4:43 i saw another orb flying really really slow headed south east.
then another one (they are all appearing from the same spot like before) headed north west turned slowly and headed back north east.
this one could not have been a satellite.
content.summary: Transparent whitish triangular craft gliding out over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and his girlfriend were going for coffee at 12:20 am on saturday, may 14, 2011 and saw some clouds that formed a smiley face. they took several pictures of the clouds with a camera phone, went for their coffee, and then returned home. the next day when they were looking at the pictures saw something they didn't notice the night before. near the cloud's "eye" they saw what appears to be an object in the sky that is somewhat disc-shaped. they say there was no plane in the sky, no airtraffic at all and there was nothing inside the vehicle reflecting onto the windshield that could account for it.

i have showed the photo to some people and they dismiss it as a lens flare. but if it is indeed a lens flare, why was it not in other pictures taken from the same angle and with the same sources of light?

i have attached two pictures taken moments apart and would be grateful if somebody could analyze them to determine whether or not what is in the second picture is in fact a lens flare or something else. 

best regards.
content.summary: My friends were out driving around and taking pictures of clouds. they noticed something strange in them the next day.

content.detailedDescription:
About 10:20pm, i was bringing my brother home from work (northampton to southampton). on rt. 10 where pomery meadow rd. meet, i first noticed a pair of "orbs" flying in the same direction (towards westfield) in unison with each other, lost them over some trees, got to my brother/parents house, dropped him off, (he did not see them, i at first wasn't thinking anything of it, just some planes..). they live right on rt.10,dropped him off and i pulled out of their driveway, back towards easthampton, i took a right onto clark st.(southampton), a right onto east st. then i noticed a large craft with red and blueish lights hovering over a field on pleasant st. so i took that left, i was amazed, it was making a not too loud humming noise. i kept driving because i admit, i was kinda freaked out, this is my first "ufo" sighting. as i kept driving i saw the same "orbs" as before, atleast, i think they were the same ones. i slowed down to get a better look, as one of them seemed to be tailing me, everytime i looked out my driver side window, it was right beside me probably a couple hundred yards away. it stayed with my until i reached the center of easthampton, i then lost it. i will say, as i looked at it out my window, i had an amazed look on my face, a big smile all the way home, i kinda felt it was following me purposely. if you need a map of where i was driving, i can come up with one.

thank you
content.summary: Multiple reddish orange lights, small, compared to larger "base"?, square, red and blueish lights

content.detailedDescription:
I'm looking at some pictures of the video for "around the world in 60 minutes" shown on bbc 4 and it looks as though they use lens flare to cover up video of spacecraft.

there are three orbs to start, then a ton of hexagonal lens flare goes all over the screen but the orbs only move a tiny amount and are not hexagonal and don't move at near the same speed with the rest of the "lens flare" they also do not move at the same angle.

this site has some pictures:
http://newsfeed.Kosmograd.Com/kosmograd/2011/03/shuttle-hexagon-lensflare.Html

didn't know who to tell or how to get others to look at it...
content.summary: "around the world in 60 minutes" cover up of ufos by lens flare?
content.locationName: Actually on tthe space st, Hawaii
